name: lemmy
description: Lemmy is an open-source, federated alternative to Reddit, built with ActivityPub. It supports communities, posts, moderation, and federation across servers, allowing users full control of their data and interactions.
features: Federated Communities: ActivityPub protocol, Cross-server interaction, Decentralized network. Join the federated Reddit alternative.
Community Management: Create communities, Moderation tools, Custom rules. Build and moderate your own spaces.
Content Sharing: Posts and comments, Voting system, Media support. Share and discuss content freely.
Self-Hosted: Full data ownership, Privacy control, Custom instance. Run your own Lemmy server.
